transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: The mineral raw materials used (clay, sand, feldspar) come directly from their places of origin (quarries or production sites) and arrive via ship and road transport. No extra detours are taken.

transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: The mineral raw materials used (clay, sand, feldspar) come directly from their places of origin (quarries or production sites) and arrive via ship and road transport. No extra detours are taken.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts or wastage, it is recommended to consider the layout, design and size of the tile
modern_slavery_comments: Italcer Group guarantees the protection of human rights throughout the value chain.
installation_risks_description: Silica is a naturally occurring mineral found in many types of rock and soil, and therefore  is found in many construction materials including tiles.  Please contact us for more information.

We are under an NDA for manufacturer information and either don't get or can't share info such as manufacturer location. Therefore for we have listed the supplier's head office info in the US.

This woven silica wall covering is PVC-free, naturally breathable and enhances indoor air quality. It is derived from silica sand with a bio-based coating.

recyclable_offcuts_description: They can be crushed and used as concrete aggregates or road construction.
recycled_content_description: Pre-consumer recycled materials is approximately 30%.
recycling_process_description: After demolition and deconstruction, ceramic tiles can be crushed and used in a wide range of different applications, such as concrete aggregates or road construction.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes - there are no water discharges resulting from the manufacturing process of the products since the water used in plant washing and squaring processes is totally recycled internally in the process, both in the preparation phase of the mixture and for the production of atomized, and only to a small extent delivered externally for recovery to authorized parties, in the form of ceramic sludge and unpurified water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: The mineral raw materials used (clay, sand, feldspar) come directly from their places of origin (quarries or production sites) and arrive via ship and road transport. No extra detours are taken.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts or wastage, it is recommended to consider the layout, design and size of the tile

recycled_content_description: Our Eco Commercial Wallpaper is made with a proprietary blend of polyester and natural fibers. The natural fiber component is FSC certified. It contains 31% Post Consumer Recycled content reclaimed from plastic bottles.
end_of_life_program_description: The product is PVC-free and can potentially be repurposed through specialised recycling programs, such as those offered by Terracycle; however, actual recycling availability depends on local facilities and programs.
water_reduction_techniques: Our manufacturer utilises closed-loop systems for chilling, which do not require the use of fresh water.
minimisation_design_strategy: Our wallpapers are printed to order to reduce over production and wastage.
other_comments:
This eco-friendly wallpaper offers a matte, lightly textured surface and strong non-woven backing, suitable for general workplace, commercial and hospitality environments. Digitally printed in Australia, Eco Commercial Wallpaper is sustainable, PVC Free and breathable, and made from 31% post-consumer recycled content. 
https://www.willieweston.com/
type_of_packaging: We use a 'Global Green Tag' verified biodegradable plastic tape for all our packaging. We recycle soft plastic packaging that we receive from suppliers and mills through Reground.
